body_html:
Awesome. Sounds good to me! Will look into adding some new methods/distributions over the next week or so and open a PR (or two)

In regards to new distributions I'll probably start with Exponential.

Other distributions:

  • Beta distribution
  • Categorical distribution
  • Dirichlet distribution
  • Dirichlet-Multinomial compound distribution
  • Gamma distribution
  • Student's t-distribution
  • Uniform

body:
Awesome. Sounds good to me! Will look into adding some new methods/distributions over the next week or so and open a PR (or two)

In regards to new distributions I'll probably start with Exponential.

Other distributions:

- Beta distribution
- Categorical distribution
- Dirichlet distribution
- Dirichlet-Multinomial compound distribution
- Gamma distribution
- Student's t-distribution
- Uniform
